name: AnnoyingNoises
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: annoying noises
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Experience the most annoying noises and cringeworthy jokes known to humankind!

FEATURES
• Choose from dozens of annoying sounds like sirens, alarms, dentist drills, microphone feedback, air horns, and more!
• Tap the "Surprise Me" button for a random sound.
• Or select "Play All" to hear them all.

THE VERY ANNOYING EXPANSION PACK
With the Very Annoying Expansion Pack, you can unlock:
• Even more exclusive, extremely annoying noises
• The ability to repeat sounds over and over for maximum irritation
• The most cringeworthy jokes

SUPPORTED DEVICES
Annoying Noises is available only on Alexa-enabled devices with a screen.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
